lead_paragraph: The relationship between Coach Jim Calhoun and the family of the Huskies’ star freshman Jeremy Lamb goes back 27 years, and it wasn’t always very happy for Calhoun.
snippet: The relationship between Coach Jim Calhoun and the family of the Huskies’ star freshman Jeremy Lamb goes back 27 years, and it wasn’t always very happy for Calhoun.
